name: Design system 1.0
description: Hi, This a simple design system that engage starters an enable them explore their abilities in a defined manner It contains, Scalable typography, Responsive grid layout, Scalable icons and a color wheel. Designers should be aware that they are guidelines to follow when designing and branding a product. I hope this system will help kickstart that energy and drive to immerse you as a designer into the product design world.
